commit.message:
Merge pull request #42 from coagulant/feature/dj17

Django 1.7 migrations support

Merge pull request #48 from ksonbol/master

Raise ValueError in get_db_prep_value() when value is of invalid length
call uuid.UUID(value) in get_db_prep_value() to cover all uuid exceptions
raise ValueError in get_db_prep_value when value is of invalid length (fixes #46)

Merge pull request #38 from chris-martin/uuid-version-doc

Remove "(calculated using the UUID1 method)" doc

Merge pull request #34 from luto/python3

Python 3 Support (#33)

Merge pull request #43 from hobbestigrou/43-fix_max_legth_with_hyphenate

Update problem with hyphenate.
[Core] Use format is better.

[Core] Fix the max_lenth to 36 when hyphenate option is used (fixes
 #43).
Django 1.7 migrations support

Remove "(calculated using the UUID1 method)" doc

When auto=True, the UUID is generated using the specified version, not
necessarily UUID1.
python 3: dropped __unicode__ use str() instead of unicode()

Merge pull request #28 from vitaly4uk/master

python 3.3 support fix

Merge pull request #27 from MikeAmy/master

Remove hyphens from UUIDs passed into queries
python 3.3 support fix
python 3.3 support fix
added fix for failing test
Added sqlite test runner and failing test that looks up an object with a hyphenated UUID

Merge pull request #21 from baremetal/hyphenated_uuid

Added hyphenate kwarg to UUIDField.

Added hyphenate kwarg to UUIDField.

This allows the field to be created with the hyphenate option, which
will print the UUID with hyphens in it.

Merge pull request #10 from pjdelport/master

Import the psycopg2.extras module fully.

Add django-nose to tox deps.

This makes sure django-nose gets installed to the tox virtualenv,
avoiding setuptools downloading and installing it as an in-place egg
later.

Import the psycopg2.extras module fully.

The psycopg2 package import alone won't load the extras module,
resulting in an AttributeError here, when running test cases or other
code that did not previously have the side effect of importing the
extras module.
(ignore setuptools-downloaded eggs too)
Switch to django-nose
Remove test suite hackery and bump version to 0.4.0
Correct readme about reading the source
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:dcramer/django-uuidfield
